title_localized.en: Is smoking allowed at the hotels?

faq_content_localized.en:
Apple Core Hotels offer both smoking and non-smoking rooms at The Hotel at Times Square, which is available upon request. The Hotel at New York City is smoke-free.

You may also walk outside to the street to smoke. New York City's Smoke-Free Act of 2002 prohibits smoking in bars, restaurants, office building, parks, and public areas.
